questions.question: They had ……………………….. hope of success yet they persevered.
The movie was …………………………. interesting.
questions.description: We do not normally use little to modify adjectives or adverbs with a negative meaning.

questions.question: They arrived ………………………….. late.
questions.description: We can use a little before adjectives with a negative meaning.

questions.question: We have got ……………………….. meat.
questions.description: We use a little before uncountable nouns.

questions.question: ……………………………….. people understand philosophy.
questions.description: We use few before a plural noun.

questions.question: Only ………………………….. us are really honest.
questions.description: We use few of before a pronoun.

questions.question: Could I try a …………………………….. your soup?
questions.description: Before a pronoun we use little of.

questions.question: Only …………………………… children in the class passed the test.
questions.description: We use a few before a noun without a determiner.

questions.question: Only …………………………….. the students like math.
questions.description: Before a noun with a determiner we use few of / a few of.

questions.question: An average politician has …………………………… real power.
questions.description: We use little before uncountable nouns.

questions.question: ……………………………….. people can speak a foreign language perfectly.
